text: Okay, let me get this straight.
speaker: A

text: You're gonna go fight a dragon and rescue a princess just so Farquaad will give you back a swamp, which you only don't have because he filled it full of freaks in the first place. Is that about right?
speaker: A

text: You know what? Maybe there's a good reason donkeys shouldn't talk.
speaker: B

text: I don't get it, Shrek.
speaker: A

text: Why don't you just pull some of that ogre stuff on him, you know, throttle him, lay siege to his fortress, grind his bones to make your bread, you know, the whole ogre trip.
speaker: A

text: Oh, I know what. Maybe I could have decapitated an entire village and put their heads on a pike, gotten a knife, cut open their spleen and drink their fluids.
speaker: B

text: Does that sound good to you?
speaker: B

text: Uh, no, not really, no.
speaker: A

text: For your information, there's a lot more to ogres than people think.
speaker: B

text: Example?
speaker: A

text: Example?
speaker: B

text: Okay, um, ogres are like onions.
speaker: B

text: They stink?
speaker: A

text: Yes. No.
speaker: B

text: Oh, they make you cry?
speaker: A

text: No!
speaker: B

text: Oh, you leave them out in the sun, they get all brown, start sprouting little white hairs.
speaker: A

text: No! Layers! Onions have layers. Ogres have layers. Onions have layers.
speaker: B

text: You get it. We both have layers.
speaker: B

text: Oh, you both have layers.
speaker: A

text: Oh. You know, not everybody like onions.
speaker: A

text: Cake! Everybody loves cakes.
speaker: A

text: Cakes have layers.
speaker: A

text: I don't care
speaker: B

text: what everyone likes.
speaker: B

text: Ogres are not like cakes.
speaker: B

text: You know what else everybody like? Parfaits.
speaker: A

text: Have you ever met a person and you say, hey, let's get some parfaits, they say, hell no, I don't like no parfaits. Parfaits are delicious.
speaker: A

text: No! You dense, irritating, miniature beast of burden! Ogres are like onions. End of story. Bye-bye. See you later.
speaker: B

text: Parfaits may be the most delicious thing on the whole damn planet.
speaker: A

text: You know, I think I preferred your humming.
speaker: B

text: Do you have a tissue or something? Because i'm making a mess. Just the word parfait made me start slobbing.
speaker: A
